Construction options of [AInterleavedConnector](./core.ainterleavedconnector.md)<!-- -->.

```typescript
export interface IInterleavedConfig<TOffsets> 
```

|  [blockElementCount](./core.iinterleavedconfig.blockelementcount.md) | number |  |
|  [length?](./core.iinterleavedconfig.length.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The interleaved length (as opposed to the data length, which would be length \* blockSize). |

|  [startIndex?](./core.iinterleavedconfig.startindex.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The interleaved index (as opposed to the data offset, which would be index \* blockSize). |
